from math import factorial
def nCr (n,r):
    return (factorial(n)/(factorial(n-r)*factorial(r)))
T = input()
while T:
    T-=1
    Arr = [int(x) for x in raw_input().split()]
    K = input()
    Arr.sort(reverse = True)
    x = Arr.count(Arr[K-1])
    Temp = Arr[0:K]
    y = Temp.count(Arr[K-1])
    print nCr(x,y)
